hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Said al-Khudri: A neck will emerge from the fire and will speak, saying: I have been assigned today (to punish) three groups: every arrogant tyrant, and whoever made with Allah another god, and whoever killed a soul without (just cause for killing) a soul. Then it will wrap around them and cast them into the depths of Hell.

narrators.name: Yahya ibn Abbad
narrators.full_name: Yahya ibn Abbad ibn Shayban ibn Malik al-Ansari

narrators.name: Abdullah ibn Ahmad
narrators.full_name: Abdullah ibn Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Hanbal

chainIssues: Indirect transmission with weak narrator Atiyyah

potential_issues.issue: Atiyyah ibn Sa'd (Da'if narrator) is in the chain
potential_issues.impact: Atiyyah is classified as Da'if by majority of scholars, making the hadith weak

potential_issues.issue: Indirect transmission (عَنْ) with weak narrator
potential_issues.impact: The chain uses عَنْ for transmission from Firas and Atiyyah, which is indirect and problematic

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Said al-Khudri: Whoever shows off, Allah will show him off, and whoever seeks fame, Allah will make him famous (in a bad way).

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated: Whoever does not show mercy to people, Allah will not show mercy to him.

hadiths.IISGrade: Disconnections But All Narrators Are Ok

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Said al-Khudri: The slaughter of the fetus (unborn animal) is the slaughter of its mother.

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Said al-Khudri: It will be said to the companion of the Quran when he enters Paradise: Read and ascend, so he reads and ascends with each verse a step until he reads the last thing that is with him.
